TopicTitle: NVIDIA Shadowpaly: does anyone had problem with sound recording un KSP using shadowpaly

Articles.Content:
I wonder if I'm the only problem with that or perhaps other players too.

The fact that shadowpaly does not save videos from KSP in a dedicated folder, leave without comment.

I have not had a few clips not record audio. Don't know why, but only happens to me when using Shadow mode.

As for the dedicated folder. I believe it is because in .25 I think the fullscreen mode changed so it acts like borderless windowed mode rather then actual fullscreen which is required for Shadowplay to saved to a dedicated folder.
ShadowPlay for me plain does not work, but it might be due to my laptop having an Optimus chipset (meaning, it has Intel integrated graphics and a nVidia 850M)
I fix it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) it turned out that enough to just downloads new drivers from Nvidia

> 
> ShadowPlay for me plain does not work, but it might be due to my laptop having an Optimus chipset (meaning, it has Intel integrated graphics and a nVidia 850M)

Yeah, I was all excited when I heard about Shadowplay and realized I had an nVidia chipset that should do it, until I found out that it's not supported by the m-series (mobile) chipsets. So yeah, no Shadowplay on laptop, er, notebook computers
